about.title: About Me
about.bio2014: I started study Computer Science at PUC-GO in february of 2014.
about.bio2018: I finished my study at Computer Science at PUC-GO 2018.
about.bio2019: I graduated at february, and started my own company that manufactury and sell jeans.
about.bio2022: In 2022 I decided to create a website to improve my sells online, and I started to study programming again, in this website that I built, was built with html, css and wordpress, and in the august of 2022 I started studying JavaScript and december React.js
about.bio2023: In 2023 I keep improving my JavaScript skills, and I kept studying React, where I started some little projects and this Portfolio
